entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries or periods of drizzle beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 21 April 2023
